rows.label: qst105603_msg001
rows.name: There are documents from 500 years ago.

rows.label: qst105603_msg002
rows.name: That sealed room, then.

rows.label: qst105603_msg003
rows.name:
I will entrust you with
the key--huh? It's gone!?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0001
rows.name: ...What is it, Zeke?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't really wanna be
here, but this is a request
from Liberbrant-sensei.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0003
rows.name:
Liberbrant... A name I have
not heard in a long time...
What is this request?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0004
rows.name:
What's this, you're actually
gonna listen to me?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0005
rows.name:
It is not for you... Liberbrant
has been a tutor to my family
since my father's time.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0006
rows.name:
All thanks to Sensei, then...
The request is nothin' special.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0007
rows.name:
I want you to lend me the records
of the events from 500 years ago.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0008
rows.name:
The ones that write the truth
about Luxuria, of course.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0009
rows.name: ...Why?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0010
rows.name:
For Sensei... and for the
people of the country.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0011
rows.name:
The story of Adel and Luxuria
is spreading... but...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0012
rows.name:
After relyin' on it for so
long, they found out the whole
country was lyin' to them.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0013
rows.name:
They can't believe such a lie,
so even things that aren't true
might spread as if they were.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0014
rows.name: Dad... we have to handle this properly.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0015
rows.name:
Leavin' things half-done is
the worst thing we could do.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0016
rows.name: ...Understood.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0017
rows.name:
The records are in a vault in
the Hall of Honor, separate from
the room I showed you... Hm.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0018
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0019
rows.name:
I should have had the
key on my person...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0020
rows.name: Should have?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0021
rows.name: ...The chain it was on has been cut.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Wha--?! What the hell is goin' on?!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0023
rows.name:
Prince! Prince! You can't
just whack the King!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0024
rows.name: Did I... drop it?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0025
rows.name:
What kinda idiot would drop
somethin' that important?!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0026
rows.name: Oh, honestly! Calm down, Prince!

rows.label: qst105603_msg0027
rows.name:
Your Majesty! Do you have any idea
where you might have dropped it?

rows.label: qst105603_msg0028
rows.name: Any idea...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0029
rows.name:
I woke up, washed my face, got
dressed, ate... and sat here.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0030
rows.name:
After my meal, I took a tour
of the castle. Today...

rows.label: qst105603_msg0031
rows.name:
...I went from the Hall of Reception,
through the Hall of Plenty, looked at
the Hall of Sincerity, and came back.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0032
rows.name:
...So basically, you were just
wanderin' around the basement.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0033
rows.name: Yes... I did not go outside.

rows.label: qst105603_msg0034
rows.name:
Can't be helped. Guess
we'll search the castle...
